name: D/D Orthros
effectText: When you take battle or effect damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned to your field, you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Fiend monsters.
pendEffect: Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field and 1 other "D/D" or "Dark Contract" card you control; destroy them.
